citation_details.title: Advance machine learning methods for dyslexia biomarker detection: A review of implementation details and challenges

citation_details.abstract: Dyslexia is a neurological disorder that is characterized by imprecise comprehension of  words and generally poor reading performance. It affects a significant population of school-age
